mapper.insert: insert into mms_format_mas( prcs_cd, mms_title, mms_contents, title_change_yn, reg_dttm, mod_dttm )values( #{prcsCd}, #{mmsTitle}, #{mmsContents}, #{titleChangeYn}, now(), now() ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE mms_title = #{mmsTitle}, mms_contents = #{mmsContents}, title_change_yn = #{titleChangeYn}, mod_dttm = now()
mapper.select: select * from mms_format_mas order by length(prcs_cd), prcs_cd
